schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
schemes.description: Comprehensive scheme ensuring water availability for irrigation with focus on every farm reaching water
schemes.eligibility: All farmers owning agricultural land with irrigation facilities or potential
benefits: Up to 80% subsidy on irrigation infrastructure
schemes.benefit: Up to 80% subsidy on irrigation infrastructure + technical support

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
schemes.description: Comprehensive crop insurance coverage to protect farmers against crop losses
schemes.eligibility: All farmers (landowners and tenant farmers) for any crop
benefits: Easy registration through common service centers
schemes.benefit: Insurance coverage up to crop value + quick claim settlement

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme (SHC)
schemes.description: Program providing regular soil testing and personalized nutrient recommendations for farmers
schemes.eligibility: All farmers willing to get soil tested and follow recommendations
benefits: Free soil testing at designated centers
Digital Soil Health Card with recommendations
Increased productivity through proper nutrient use
schemes.benefit: Free soil testing + personalized recommendations + digital card

schemes.name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
schemes.description: Direct income support scheme providing cash transfer to all landholding farmers
schemes.eligibility: All landholding farmers regardless of landholding size
schemes.benefit: ₹6,000 per year in 3 equal installments directly to bank

schemes.name: Andhra Pradesh Irrigation Assistance Program
schemes.description: State-specific program providing financial assistance for irrigation development and modernization
schemes.eligibility: Farmers in Andhra Pradesh with registered agricultural land
benefits: Subsidy up to 50% on selected components

schemes.name: Rajasthan Maize Improvement Program
schemes.description: State scheme promoting improved maize varieties and farming techniques
schemes.eligibility: Farmers in Rajasthan cultivating or willing to cultivate maize
benefits: Free seed supply of improved varieties
schemes.benefit: Free seeds + 40% subsidy on inputs + training

schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
schemes.description: Organic farming promotion scheme encouraging traditional farming methods with modern technology
schemes.eligibility: Groups of minimum 20-50 farmers with 50+ hectares for organic farming

schemes.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
schemes.description: State-led scheme for development of agriculture and allied sectors
schemes.eligibility: Individual farmers and farmer groups registered with state agriculture department
benefits: Support for setting up agro-processing units
schemes.benefit: Subsidy up to 50% for agricultural projects
